title: 求一个可以用服务器内置点劵或者金币维修武器装备耐久度的插件
author: xuan_heng

replies.author: penjing
replies.txt_content: ChestCommands BOSSSHOP都可以 设置消费 点券 执行指令修复装备 搭配非凡RPG

replies.author: xuan_heng
replies.txt_content:
penjing 发表于 2018-7-29 17:44
ChestCommands BOSSSHOP都可以 设置消费 点券 执行指令修复装备 搭配非凡RPG
有没有可以适合Cauldron服务器的插件

replies.author: Bilibili黑炽
replies.txt_content: ess（好像是）插件的/repair 修理

replies.author: 一梦入神宫.
replies.txt_content: Essentials插件自带维修 指令如同楼上/repair或者/fix 配合Chestcommand插件即可做到你的要求

replies.author: xuan_heng
replies.txt_content:
